#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <stack>

using namespace std;

long long int MOD = 10000;


int ipow(int base, int exp)
{
    int result = 1;
    while (exp)
    {
        if (exp & 1)
            result *= base;
        exp >>= 1;
        base *= base;
    }

    return result;
}

int main()
{
	int  n;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		int a[n];
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		}
		int i = n, j = n - 1, cnt = 0;
		while (j >= 0) {
			if (a[j] != i) {
				cnt++;
			} else {
				i--;
			}
			j--;
		}
		cout << cnt << endl;
	return 0;
}
